title: RT News - October 14, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: Celebrations in northern Syria as a deal is reportedly struck between the Kurds and Damascus that will see government troops deployed to the area that as Turkey continues its military offensive in the area. Meantime, fears of a potential terrorist resurgence are growing. Kurdish officials say a Turkish bombardment led to hundreds of relatives of foreign ISIL members fleeing a prison compound with Turkey dubbing the claims 'disinformation'. President Putin heads to Saudi Arabia on a state visit to meet King Salman and the Saudi Crown Prince. We'll be there too following events. A child gender clinic in the UK is sued over the alleged use of under-researched 'experimental' treatments. We hear from a psychotherapist who worked there.
description: Celebrations in northern Syria as a deal is reportedly struck between the Kurds and Damascus that will see government troops deployed to the area that as Turkey continues its military offensive in the area
